verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> the words הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <S%H7892><s%> of this song הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הִצִּ֨יל <S%H5337><s%> had delivered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> him out of the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֹיְבָ֖יו <S%H341><s%> of all his enemies וּמִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> and out of the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And he said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD סַֽלְעִ֥י <S%H5553><s%> [is] my rock וּמְצֻדָתִ֖י <S%H4686><s%> and my fortress וּמְפַלְטִי־ <S%H6403><s%> and my deliverer לִֽי׃

אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> The God צוּרִ֖י <S%H6697><s%> of my rock אֶחֱסֶה־ <S%H2620><s%> in him will I trust בּ֑וֹ מָגִנִּ֞י <S%H4043><s%> [he is] my shield וְקֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> and the horn יִשְׁעִ֗י <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation מִשְׂגַּבִּי֙ <S%H4869><s%> my high tower וּמְנוּסִ֔י <S%H4498><s%> and my refuge מֹשִׁעִ֕י <S%H3467><s%> my saviour מֵחָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> me from violence תֹּשִׁעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> thou savest

מְהֻלָּ֖ל <S%H1984><s%> [who is] worthy to be praised אֶקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> I will call יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> on the LORD וּמֵאֹיְבַ֖י <S%H341><s%> from mine enemies אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> so shall I be saved

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲפָפֻ֖נִי <S%H661><s%> compassed מִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <S%H4867><s%> When the waves מָ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death נַחֲלֵ֥י <S%H5158><s%> me the floods בְלִיַּ֖עַל <S%H1100><s%> of ungodly men יְבַעֲתֻֽנִי׃ <S%H1204><s%> made me afraid

חֶבְלֵ֥י <S%H2256><s%> The sorrows שְׁא֖וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of hell סַבֻּ֑נִי <S%H5437><s%> compassed me about קִדְּמֻ֖נִי <S%H6923><s%> prevented מֹֽקְשֵׁי־ <S%H4170><s%> the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

בַּצַּר־ <S%H6862><s%> In my distress לִי֙ אֶקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> I called יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> to my God אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> and cried וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> and he did hear מֵהֵֽיכָלוֹ֙ <S%H1964><s%> out of his temple קוֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וְשַׁוְעָתִ֖י <S%H7775><s%> and my cry בְּאָזְנָֽיו׃ <S%H241><s%> [did enter] into his ears

[וַתְגָּעַשׁ כ] (וַיִּתְגָּעַ֤שׁ <S%H1607><s%> shook ק) וַתִּרְעַשׁ֙ <S%H7493><s%> and trembled הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Then the earth מוֹסְד֥וֹת <S%H4146><s%> the foundations הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <S%H7264><s%> moved וַיִּֽתְגָּעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H1607><s%> and shook כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חָ֥רָה <S%H2734><s%> because he was wroth לֽוֹ׃

עָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> There went up עָשָׁן֙ <S%H6227><s%> a smoke בְּאַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> out of his nostrils וְאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> and fire מִפִּ֖יו <S%H6310><s%> out of his mouth תֹּאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> devoured גֶּחָלִ֖ים <S%H1513><s%> coals בָּעֲר֥וּ <S%H1197><s%> were kindled מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַיֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> He bowed שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וַיֵּרַ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> also and came down וַעֲרָפֶ֖ל <S%H6205><s%> and darkness תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> [was] under his feet

וַיִּרְכַּ֥ב <S%H7392><s%> And he rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כְּר֖וּב <S%H3742><s%> upon a cherub וַיָּעֹ֑ף <S%H5774><s%> and did fly וַיֵּרָ֖א <S%H7200><s%> and he was seen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כַּנְפֵי־ <S%H3671><s%> upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of the wind

וַיָּ֥שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> And he made חֹ֛שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> darkness סְבִיבֹתָ֖יו <S%H5439><s%> round about סֻכּ֑וֹת <S%H5521><s%> pavilions חַֽשְׁרַת־ <S%H2841><s%> him dark מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters עָבֵ֥י <S%H5645><s%> [and] thick clouds שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <S%H7834><s%> of the skies
מִנֹּ֖גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> Through the brightness נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5048><s%> before בָּעֲר֖וּ <S%H1197><s%> kindled גַּחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> before him were coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

יַרְעֵ֥ם <S%H7481><s%> thundered מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְעֶלְי֖וֹן <S%H5945><s%> and the most High יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> uttered קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> his voice

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent out חִצִּ֖ים <S%H2671><s%> arrows וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם <S%H6327><s%> and scattered בָּרָ֖ק <S%H1300><s%> them lightning [וַיְּהֻמֵּם כ] (וַיָּהֹֽם׃ <S%H2000><s%> break ק)

וַיֵּֽרָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֲפִ֣קֵי <S%H650><s%> And the channels יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea יִגָּל֖וּ <S%H1540><s%> were discovered מֹסְד֣וֹת <S%H4146><s%> the foundations תֵּבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world בְּגַעֲרַ֣ת <S%H1606><s%> at the rebuking יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִנִּשְׁמַ֖ת <S%H5397><s%> at the blast ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of the breath אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> of his nostrils

יִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent מִמָּר֖וֹם <S%H4791><s%> from above יִקָּחֵ֑נִי <S%H3947><s%> he took יַֽמְשֵׁ֖נִי <S%H4871><s%> me he drew מִמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> me out of many

יַצִּילֵ֕נִי <S%H5337><s%> He delivered מֵאֹיְבִ֖י <S%H341><s%> enemy עָ֑ז <S%H5794><s%> me from my strong מִשֹּׂ֣נְאַ֔י <S%H8130><s%> [and] from them that hated כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְצ֖וּ <S%H553><s%> me for they were too strong מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> were too

יְקַדְּמֻ֖נִי <S%H6923><s%> They prevented בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> me in the day אֵידִ֑י <S%H343><s%> of my calamity וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD מִשְׁעָ֖ן <S%H4937><s%> was my stay לִֽי׃

וַיֹּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> He brought me forth לַמֶּרְחָ֖ב <S%H4800><s%> also into a large place אֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> יְחַלְּצֵ֖נִי <S%H2502><s%> he delivered כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חָ֥פֵֽץ <S%H2654><s%> me because he delighted בִּֽי׃

יִגְמְלֵ֥נִי <S%H1580><s%> rewarded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD כְּצִדְקָתִ֑י <S%H6666><s%> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <S%H1252><s%> according to the cleanness יָדַ֖י <S%H3027><s%> of my hands יָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> hath he recompensed לִֽי׃

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֖רְתִּי <S%H8104><s%> For I have kept דַּרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> the ways יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not רָשַׁ֖עְתִּי <S%H7561><s%> and have not wickedly departed מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> from my God

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all [מִשְׁפֹּטֹו כ] (מִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> adversary ק) לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <S%H5048><s%> before וְחֻקֹּתָ֖יו <S%H2708><s%> [were] before me and [as for] his statutes לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not אָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> I did not depart מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> at
וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> was also תָמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> I was also upright ל֑וֹ וָאֶשְׁתַּמְּרָ֖ה <S%H8104><s%> before him and have kept מֵעֲוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H5771><s%> myself from mine iniquity

וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> hath recompensed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD לִ֖י כְּצִדְקָתִ֑י <S%H6666><s%> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹרִ֖י <S%H1252><s%> according to my cleanness לְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> his eyes

עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With חָסִ֖יד <S%H2623><s%> With the merciful תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד <S%H2616><s%> thou wilt shew thyself merciful עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> man תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> [and] with the upright תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ <S%H8552><s%> thou wilt shew thyself upright

עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With נָבָ֖ר <S%H1305><s%> With the pure תִּתָּבָ֑ר <S%H1305><s%> thou wilt shew thyself pure וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> and with עִקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6141><s%> and with the froward תִּתַּפָּֽל׃ <S%H6617><s%> thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> And the afflicted תּוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> thou wilt save וְעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> but thine eyes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on רָמִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> [are] upon the haughty תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <S%H8213><s%> [that] thou mayest bring [them] down

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You נֵירִ֖י <S%H5216><s%> For thou [art] my lamp יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יַגִּ֥יהַּ <S%H5050><s%> will lighten חָשְׁכִּֽי׃ <S%H2822><s%> my darkness

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בְכָ֖ה אָר֣וּץ <S%H7323><s%> For by thee I have run גְּד֑וּד <S%H1416><s%> through a troop בֵּאלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> by my God אֲדַלֶּג־ <S%H1801><s%> have I leaped over שֽׁוּר׃ <S%H7791><s%> a wall

הָאֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> [As for] God תָּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> [is] perfect דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way אִמְרַ֤ת <S%H565><s%> the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְרוּפָ֔ה <S%H6884><s%> [is] tried מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> he [is] a buckler ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all הַחֹסִ֥ים <S%H2620><s%> to all them that trust בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> who אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> For who [is] God מִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י <S%H1107><s%> save יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who צ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> rock מִֽבַּלְעֲדֵ֥י <S%H1107><s%> save אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

הָאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God מָעוּזִּ֖י <S%H4581><s%> [is] my strength חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> [and] power וַיַּתֵּ֥ר <S%H5425><s%> and he maketh תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> perfect [דַּרְכֹּו כ] (דַּרְכִּֽי׃ <S%H1870><s%> along ק)

מְשַׁוֶּ֥ה <S%H7737><s%> like [רַגְלָיו כ] (רַגְלַ֖י <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure ק) כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת <S%H355><s%> hinds' וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> on בָּמוֹתַ֖י <S%H1116><s%> me upon my high places יַעֲמִדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5975><s%> [feet] and setteth

מְלַמֵּ֥ד <S%H3925><s%> He teacheth יָדַ֖י <S%H3027><s%> my hands לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to war וְנִחַ֥ת <S%H5181><s%> is broken קֶֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7198><s%> so that a bow נְחוּשָׁ֖ה <S%H5154><s%> of steel זְרֹעֹתָֽי׃ <S%H2220><s%> by mine arms

וַתִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast also given לִ֖י מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> me the shield יִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <S%H3468><s%> of thy salvation וַעֲנֹתְךָ֖ <S%H6031><s%> defile תַּרְבֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H7235><s%> hath made me great

תַּרְחִ֥יב <S%H7337><s%> Thou hast enlarged צַעֲדִ֖י <S%H6806><s%> my steps תַּחְתֵּ֑נִי <S%H8478><s%> under וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not מָעֲד֖וּ <S%H4571><s%> did not slip קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ <S%H7166><s%> under me so that my feet

אֶרְדְּפָ֥ה <S%H7291><s%> I have pursued אֹיְבַ֖י <S%H341><s%> mine enemies וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֑ם <S%H8045><s%> and destroyed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not אָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> them and turned not again עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3615><s%> until I had consumed

וָאֲכַלֵּ֥ם <S%H398><s%> burn up וָאֶמְחָצֵ֖ם <S%H4272><s%> them and wounded וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יְקוּמ֑וּן <S%H6965><s%> them that they could not arise וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> yea they are fallen תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> under my feet

וַתַּזְרֵ֥נִי <S%H247><s%> For thou hast girded חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> me with strength לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle תַּכְרִ֥יעַ <S%H3766><s%> against me hast thou subdued קָמַ֖י <S%H6965><s%> them that rose up תַּחְתֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

וְאֹ֣יְבַ֔י <S%H341><s%> of mine enemies תַּ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast also given לִּ֖י עֹ֑רֶף <S%H6203><s%> me the necks מְשַׂנְאַ֖י <S%H8130><s%> them that hate וָאַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H6789><s%> that I might destroy

יִשְׁע֖וּ <S%H8159><s%> They looked וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> but [there was] none to save אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [even] unto the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָנָֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> but he answered

וְאֶשְׁחָקֵ֖ם <S%H7833><s%> Then did I beat כַּעֲפַר־ <S%H6083><s%> them as small as the dust אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth כְּטִיט־ <S%H2916><s%> them as the mire חוּצ֥וֹת <S%H2351><s%> of the street אֲדִקֵּ֖ם <S%H1854><s%> I did stamp אֶרְקָעֵֽם׃ <S%H7554><s%> [and] did spread them abroad

וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵ֔נִי <S%H6403><s%> Thou also hast delivered מֵרִיבֵ֖י <S%H7379><s%> me from the strivings עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> of my people תִּשְׁמְרֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H8104><s%> thou hast kept לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> me [to be] head גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> a people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> [which] I knew יַעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> not shall serve

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵכָ֖ר <S%H5236><s%> alien יִתְכַּֽחֲשׁוּ־ <S%H3584><s%> shall submit לִ֑י לִשְׁמ֥וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> they shall be obedient אֹ֖זֶן <S%H241><s%> they יִשָּׁ֥מְעוּ <S%H8085><s%> obey לִֽי׃

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵכָ֖ר <S%H5236><s%> alien יִבֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5034><s%> shall fade away וְיַחְגְּר֖וּ <S%H2296><s%> and they shall be afraid מִמִּסְגְּרוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4526><s%> out of their close places

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וּבָר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed צוּרִ֑י <S%H6697><s%> [be] my rock וְיָרֻ֕ם <S%H7311><s%> and exalted אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> be the God צ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> of the rock יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation

הָאֵ֕ל <S%H410><s%> It [is] God הַנֹּתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> executes נְקָמֹ֖ת <S%H5360><s%> vengeance לִ֑י וּמוֹרִ֥יד <S%H3381><s%> me and that bringeth down עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> the people תַּחְתֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

וּמוֹצִיאִ֖י <S%H3318><s%> And that bringeth me forth מֵאֹֽיְבָ֑י <S%H341><s%> from mine enemies וּמִקָּמַי֙ <S%H6965><s%> above them that rose up תְּר֣וֹמְמֵ֔נִי <S%H7311><s%> thou also hast lifted me up on high מֵאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חֲמָסִ֖ים <S%H2555><s%> me from the violent תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> against me thou hast delivered

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> Therefore I will give thanks יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee O LORD בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen וּלְשִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> unto thy name אֲזַמֵּֽר׃ <S%H2167><s%> and I will sing praises

[מִגְדִיל כ] (מִגְדֹּ֖ול <S%H1431><s%> advance ק) יְשׁוּע֣וֹת <S%H3444><s%> of salvation מַלְכּ֑וֹ <S%H4428><s%> for his king וְעֹֽשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and sheweth חֶ֧סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy לִמְשִׁיח֛וֹ <S%H4899><s%> to his anointed לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David וּלְזַרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and to his seed עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> evermore פ
